question: The Mandu Festival is held in Madhya Pradesh. Who is organising this event?
explanation: The first edition of Mandu Festival haS begun in Mandu, Madhya Pradesh. It is organised by the Madhya Pradesh Tourism Board. This festival is based on the idea of “Khojne Me Kho Jao”. It would involve the celebration of historic heritage blended with the modern liveliness of the city culture.
